name: Sir Yron
description:
The Undead have risen and plague the land!

Don your armor, grab your sword and shield and join Sir Yron on a quest to purify the land of these wretched monsters once more.

Battle against waves after waves of undead enemies as you tread deeper into the ever-shifting mists in this arcade-inspired hack'n'slash.

Features
  • Progressively more intense Single-Player Action
  • Procedurally generated waves of enemies
  • Spooky, spooky atmosphere
  • Play with Controller or Keyboard & Mouse!

This game was made as a part of the Tampere University's Games Academy Summer 2020
